name: Exotic Share Bundle
desc:
Strange gems that the Guild routinely gives out, and which contain elemental power.

You may select and obtain one of the following upon using this item:
·Agnidus Agate Fragment
·Varunada Lazurite Fragment
·Nagadus Emerald Fragment
·Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
·Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
·Shivada Jade Fragment
·Prithiva Topaz Fragment

customize.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
customize.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

customize.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
customize.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

customize.name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
customize.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

customize.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
customize.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

customize.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
customize.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

customize.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
customize.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Genesis Crystal
customize.desc: An energy crystal from the very origin of the universe. Formed from within nothingness out of pure potential and hope, it contains enough energy to create a newborn star.
